intro:
A witch who has lost her memory boards a train in an unfamiliar world
and travels to recover her memories.
description:
■Story
I awoke in a world I didn't recognize.
I remember nothing about myself, but I can use magic!
I set out searching for an exit.
The mysterious journey of the “Crimson Witch” begins...

■Game Overview
A 2D side-scrolling action game where you control a witch who has lost her memory, traveling through a mysterious world. Defeat the monsters that appear using attack magic.Collect souls from defeated monsters to purchase items or enhance your attack magic.
Progress by helping or being helped by the “ghosts” you encounter along the way.

Bosses lie in wait ahead.

Is the witch “Purple,” who looks just like you, friend or foe?
And what are the true memories of the amnesiac “Crimson Witch”?

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
